segments.text: From where I'm looking, the kitchen seems pretty standard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman by the sink, apron on, handling a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running, but she's not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow starting, water hitting the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on stool near the cabinets, hand in cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside is neat and quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, the potential for trouble makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They might all end up soaked or hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
